text: A Farewell to Arms is a 1932 movie directed by Frank Borzage and is based on the novel of the same name by Ernest Hemmingway. It stars Gary Cooper, Helen Hayes, Adolphe Menjou, Jack La Rue and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It was nominated for 4 Oscars and won 2 Academy Awards in 1934 and was remade in 1957 as A Farewell to Arms. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1930s war movies Category:1932 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:World War I movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Frank Borzage Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Italy
title: A Farewell to Arms (1932 movie)
